Title: Last Hurrah: Emerald Dream
Description:
The druids call for aid!

Energy from the Emerald Dream is spreading across the Dragon Isles, please help them investigate it.

They also ask you travel to the Emerald Dream and assist Sprucecrown in creating a Superbloom.

Some of the druids also wish for you to plant Dreamseeds in the Emerald Dream.

Please help them, $n.
ObjectivesText: Gather one hundred Dreamsurge Coalescence across the Dragon isles, assist Sprucecrown in creating a Superbloom, and plant 3 Dreamseeds of any quality in the Emerald Dream. Dreamseeds can be acquired from most activities in the Emerald Dream.
